import React,{useContext,useState,useEffect}from"react";import LanguageContext from"../LanguageContext.js";import useInView from"../useInView.js";import"./Mission.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Mission(){const{isEnglish}=useContext(LanguageContext);const[ref,inView]=useInView({threshold:0.3});const[hasAnimated,setHasAnimated]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{if(inView&&!hasAnimated){setHasAnimated(true);}},[inView,hasAnimated]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{id:"mission",ref:ref,className:"mission ".concat(hasAnimated?"animate":""),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:isEnglish?"Our Mission":"ተልዕኮ"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:isEnglish?"To meet critical healthcare needs across the U.S. by serving as a trusted liaison connecting international RNs with healthcare providers.":"በአሜሪካ አገር ውስጥ ከሚገኙ ጤና ተቋማት ጋር የተገባ ግንኙነት በመስጠት ሁሉንም ጥቅም የሚያመጣ እና በተሟላ ተሟላ ነርስ እንዲሆኑ የሚያስችል ተልዕኮ ነው።"})]});}export default Mission;
